summary: This document details wire transfers involving Southern Financial LLC and various banks, including Deutsche Bank Trust Co. Americas and TD Ameritrade Clearing Inc. It outlines credit amounts, account information, and transaction timestamps, indicating significant financial activity related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is associated with Southern Financial LLC as the account holder.
A wire transfer of $2,450,000.00 occurred on May 12, 2014.
An incoming money transfer of $1,000,000.00 was credited on September 13, 2017.
